attribute.name: drlReportLayout
attribute.value:
<document> <styles> <style name="atlGeneral" font="Arial" size="12" colour="black" format="" /> <style name="atlNotForProduction" font="Arial" size="30" colour="red" format="stroke" strokeColour="red" strokeWidth="1"/> <style name="atlObsolete" font="Arial" size="30" colour="red" format="stroke" strokeColour="red" strokeWidth="1"/> <style name="bold" font="Arial" size="9" format="bold"/> <style name="normal" font="Arial" size="9" format="" default="true"/> <style name="large" font="Arial" size="100" format="bold" colour="black" strokeColour="blue" strokeWidth="10" /> <style name="H1" font="Arial" size="14" format="bold" colour="red" /> <style name="H2" font="Arial" size="10" format="bold" colour="green"/> <style name="H3" font="Arial" size="20" format="" default="true"/> <style name="small" font="Arial" size="5" format="" /> <style name="smallbold" font="Arial" size="5" format="bold" /> <!-- GAP ENGMASA : Added for drawing stamping : START --> <style name="gapDrawingStyle" font="Arial" size="7" default="true" colour="red"/> <style name="gapDrawingStyleBlack" font="Arial" size="7" default="true" colour="black"/> <!-- GAP ENGMASA : Added for drawing stamping : END --> </styles> <pages> <page> <name>AllPages</name> <pageRange>-</pageRange> <unitOfMeasure>MM</unitOfMeasure> <watermarks> <!-- Razorleaf - orig <watermark style="atlGeneral" horizontalPosition="middle" verticalPosition="bottom" alignment="center" height="25" width="400" underlay="false"> <text>Printed by: </text><value on="user">First Name</value><text> </text><value on="user">Last Name</value><text> - </text><text><Úte 'yyyy-MMM-dd HH:mm'%></text> </watermark> --> <!-- Razorleaf - modified to show DATE only <watermark style="atlGeneral" horizontalPosition="middle" verticalPosition="bottom" alignment="center" height="25" width="400" underlay="false"> <text>Printed on: </text><text><Úte 'yyyy-MMM-dd HH:mm'%></text> <text>Printed on: </text><text>${lookup:NOW}</text> </watermark> End mod --> <!-- GAP ENGMASA : Added for drawing stamping : START --> <if> <condition leftHandSource="mql selectable" leftHandValue="type" condition="=" rightHandSource="fixed value" rightHandValue="gapGAPSpecification"/> <condition leftHandSource="mql selectable" leftHandValue="owner.site" condition="!=" rightHandSource="fixed value" rightHandValue="UTB"/> <elements> <watermark style="gapDrawingStyle" horizontalPosition="right" verticalPosition="bottom" alignment="left" height="9.5" width="150" underlay="false"> <text>New Drw. No. : </text> <value>name</value> </watermark> </elements> </if> <!-- for other sites -->
<if> <condition leftHandSource="mql selectable" leftHandValue="type" condition="=" rightHandSource="fixed value" rightHandValue="gapGAPSpecification"/> <condition leftHandSource="mql selectable" leftHandValue="owner.site" condition="=" rightHandSource="fixed value" rightHandValue="UTB"/> <elements> <watermark style="gapDrawingStyleBlack" horizontalPosition="right" verticalPosition="bottom" alignment="left" height="9.5" width="150" underlay="false"> <text>PLM Drw. No. : </text> <value>name</value> </watermark> </elements> </if> <!-- GAP ENGMASA : Added for drawing stamping : END --> <if> <condition leftHandSource="mql selectable" leftHandValue="current" condition="!=" rightHandSource="fixed value" rightHandValue="Approved"/> <condition leftHandSource="mql selectable" leftHandValue="current" condition="!=" rightHandSource="fixed value" rightHandValue="Batch Load"/> <condition leftHandSource="mql selectable" leftHandValue="current" condition="!=" rightHandSource="fixed value" rightHandValue="Released"/> <condition leftHandSource="mql selectable" leftHandValue="current" condition="!=" rightHandSource="fixed value" rightHandValue="Release"/> <condition leftHandSource="mql selectable" leftHandValue="current" condition="!=" rightHandSource="fixed value" rightHandValue="Obsolete"/> <elements> <watermark style="atlNotForProduction" horizontalPosition="center" verticalPosition="center" alignment="middle" rotation="45" height="80" width="300" underlay="false"> <text>NOT FOR PRODUCTION</text> </watermark> </elements> </if> <if> <condition leftHandSource="mql selectable" leftHandValue="current" condition="=" rightHandSource="fixed value" rightHandValue="Obsolete"/> <elements> <watermark style="atlObsolete" horizontalPosition="center" verticalPosition="center" alignment="middle" rotation="45" height="80" width="300" underlay="false"> <text>OBSOLETE</text> </watermark> </elements> </if> </watermarks> </page> <!--page> <name>EveryPage</name> <pageRange>-</pageRange> <unitOfMeasure>MM</unitOfMeasure> <watermarks> <watermark style="H2" horizontalPosition="left" verticalPosition="top" alignment="left" height="100" width="300" underlay="true"> <value>type</value> </watermark> <watermark style="H1" horizontalPosition="right" verticalPosition="top" alignment="left" height="100" width="300" underlay="true"> <value>Description</value> </watermark> <watermark style="bold" horizontalPosition="right" verticalPosition="top" alignment="left" height="100" width="100" underlay="true"> <text>Document No: </text><value>name</value> </watermark> <watermark style="H1" horizontalPosition="middle" verticalPosition="bottom" alignment="left" height="25" width="400" underlay="false"> <text>Printed by: </text><value on="user">First Name</value><text> </text><value on="user">Last Name</value><text> - </text><text><Úte 'yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm'%></text> </watermark> </watermarks> </page--> </pages> </document>
